name: ListDisputeEvidence
description:
Retrieve evidence related to a specific dispute.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all evidence associated with a particular dispute by specifying the dispute ID.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the dispute for which evidence is being requested.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.
For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.
